meanings.definition: The period of life between young adulthood and old age.
meanings.sent1: Many people experience a crisis during their midlife.
meanings.sent2: My dad is in his midlife and still enjoys playing sports.
meanings.sent3: At midlife, some individuals buy a sports car to feel young again.
meanings.sent4: Reaching midlife can feel like standing on a bridge between two worlds.
meanings.sent5: The concept of midlife is often portrayed in movies and TV shows.

meanings.definition: The middle part of a person's life.
meanings.sent1: During midlife, individuals may reflect on their past achievements.
meanings.sent2: She is currently in the midlife of her career and looking to make a change.
meanings.sent3: Some people celebrate reaching midlife with a big party.
meanings.sent4: The midlife of a tree is when it bears the most fruit.
meanings.sent5: In the midlife of the project, they faced unexpected challenges.

meanings.definition: The time of life between youth and old age.
meanings.sent1: Midlife is a time when people often reassess their goals and priorities.
meanings.sent2: He is experiencing a sense of fulfillment in his midlife.
meanings.sent3: During midlife, some individuals take up new hobbies to stay active.
meanings.sent4: The midlife of a butterfly is when it undergoes metamorphosis.
meanings.sent5: In the midlife of the season, the team made a remarkable comeback.
